name: static-dreamwaves
description: Track production system with song bank for creating 3-hour Synthwave/Lo-Fi/Vaporwave mixes
author: Patrick Lake

scripts.setup: python3 -m venv venv && ./venv/bin/pip install --upgrade pip && ./venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt && chmod +x scripts/*.sh && chmod +x agent/*.py
scripts.bank:status: echo '=== Song Bank Status ===' && ./venv/bin/python3 -c 'import json; data = json.load(open("song_bank/metadata/song_catalog.json")); print(f"Total songs: {data.get(\"total_tracks\", 0)}")' && echo '' && find song_bank/tracks -name '*.mp3' | wc -l | xargs echo 'Files on disk:'
scripts.status: echo '=== Tracks ===' && find tracks -maxdepth 1 -type d | grep -E 'tracks/[0-9]+$' | wc -l | xargs echo 'Track folders:' && echo '' && echo '=== Song Bank ===' && ./venv/bin/python3 -c 'import json; data = json.load(open("song_bank/metadata/song_catalog.json")); print(f"Songs in bank: {data.get(\"total_tracks\", 0)}")' && echo '' && echo '=== Rendered ===' && find rendered -name 'output.mp4' | wc -l | xargs echo 'Rendered mixes:'
scripts.status:tracks: find tracks -maxdepth 1 -type d | grep -E 'tracks/[0-9]+$' | sort && echo '' && find tracks -name '*.mp3' | wc -l | xargs echo 'Total MP3 files in tracks:'
scripts.clean:bank: rm -rf song_bank/tracks/* && ./venv/bin/python3 -c 'import json; open("song_bank/metadata/song_catalog.json", "w").write(json.dumps({"catalog_version": "1.0", "last_updated": null, "total_tracks": 0, "tracks": {}}, indent=2)); open("song_bank/metadata/prompt_index.json", "w").write(json.dumps({"prompts": {}}, indent=2))'
scripts.help:
echo '
üìú Static Dreamscapes - Track Production System
